posts._title: Radu Jude – Îmi este indiferent daca în istorie vom intra ca barbari AKA I Do Not Care If We Go Down in History as Barbarians (2018) (HD)
posts.title: Îmi este indiferent daca în istorie vom intra ca barbari
posts.excerpt: IMDb wrote:“I do not care if we go down in history as barbarians.” These words, spoken in the Council of Ministers of the summer of 1941, started the ethnic cleansing on the Eastern Front. The film attempts to comment on this statement.
posts.titleEnglish: I Do Not Care If We Go Down in History as Barbarians (2018)

posts._title: Agnès Varda – Jane B. par Agnès V. AKA Jane B. for Agnes V. (1988)
posts.title: Jane B par Agnès V
posts.excerpt: Quote:There is a good theory that explains why Agnes Varda’s Jane B. for Agnes V. was never officially distributed in the United States. Apparently, the few distributors that saw it after Varda completed it in 1988 concluded that it was too abstract and therefore too risky to sign. So until recently, it had been screened …

posts._title: Masaharu Segawa – Kanashii kibun de joke (1985)
posts.title: Kanashii kibun de joke
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: This is a sad and beautiful story about a father who is a popular comedian and a son who suffered by an incurable disease.

posts.title: The Running Man
posts.excerpt: An Englishman with a grudge against an insurance company for a disallowed claim fakes his own death in order but an insurance investigator starts snooping around.

posts._title: Hrishikesh Mukherjee – Gol Maal AKA Hanky Panky (1979)
posts.title: Gol Maal
posts.excerpt: Ramprasad is a recent college graduate who finds a job with a finicky man, Bhavani Shankar, who believes that a man without a mustache is a man without a character. Bhavani Shankar is also against any of his employees indulging in recreation of any kind. When Ramprasad is caught by his boss at a soccer …

posts.title: Aszparuh [Part 2]
posts.excerpt: Quote:The 7th century is the time of the Great Migration of the Peoples. Under the pressure of the invaders the proto-Bulgarian tribes of Khan Kubrat are forced to split in four parts in the hope that one would survive. For twenty long years Kubrat’s youngest son Khan Asparoukh led his people across many foreign lands …

posts._title: Ernesto Contreras – Párpados azules AKA Blue Eyelids [+Extras] (2007)
posts.title: Párpados azules
posts.excerpt: Marina is a lonely woman with a menial job at a uniform business that unexpectedly awards her with an all-expenses-paid holiday at a beach resort for two. She’s been unable to find anyone to go with her when she comes across a man called Víctor in a chance encounter at a bakery. Víctor claims they …
